data.name: Plague Breaker Demo
data.detailed_description:
Plague Breaker is a retro rogue-lite platformer with heavy RPG elements. Pick your class and level up, create unique combinations by multiclassing across class skill trees, or create entirely new and unique characters with the class creator. All while exploring a procedurally generated castle filled with undead monsters and corrupted plague doctors.



Heavily inspired by Rogue Legacy, Binding of Isaac, and Castlevania: Circle of the Moon. Plague Breaker features procedurally generated levels that expand as you progress further into the castle. Explore and collect weapons and magic items to prepare yourself for the boss fight, and defeat the boss to level up and explore each classes branching skill tree. Be careful though, as death is permanent!

The Plague Breaker demo features a sneak peak at the full release, including:

  • 2 Levels with 2 unique bosses
  • 1 Unlockable class
  • Unlockable character creator
  • Unlockable items
  • Splitscreen co-op

data.short_description: Plague Breaker is a retro rogue-lite platformer with heavy RPG elements. Pick your class and level up, create unique combinations by multiclassing across class skill trees, or create entirely new and unique characters with the class creator. All while exploring a procedurally generated castle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
